#include <vector>
#include <list>
#include <map>
#include <set>
#include <deque>
#include <stack>
#include <bitset>
#include <algorithm>
#include <functional>
#include <numeric>
#include <utility>
#include <sstream>
#include <iostream>
#include <iomanip>
#include <cstdio>
#include <cmath>
#include <cstdlib>
#include <ctime>
#include <string.h>
using namespace std;

#define MAX 35
long long int catalan[MAX];

void calculate_catalan_numbers() //1->1,2->1,3->2,4->5,5->14
{
    catalan[0]=1;
    int n=MAX;
    for(int i=1;i<n;i++)
    {
        catalan[i]=0;
        
            for(int j=1;j<=i;j++)
            {
                catalan[i]+=catalan[j-1]*catalan[i-j];
            }
    }

}
int main() 
{
        calculate_catalan_numbers();
        int t;
        scanf("%d",&t);

        while(t--)
        {
            char s[MAX];
            scanf("%s",s);
            
            int len=strlen(s);

            printf("%d\n",catalan[len-1]);
        }
 
		return 0;
}
